string.name: response

parameters.content:
## (1.0.13) Updates
* commands and arguments

## Recommendations 
* Remember set timeout to 15 seconds 
* string empty for switch
* getting identifier from postgres

parameters.query: =SELECT "public"."channel_api"."identifier", "public"."inboxes"."channel_id" FROM "public"."channel_api" INNER JOIN "public"."inboxes" ON "public"."channel_api"."id" = "public"."inboxes"."channel_id" WHERE "public"."channel_api"."account_id"='{{$json.extra.account}}' AND "public"."inboxes"."id" = '{{$json.extra.inbox}}';
